TextView.android:text:
You can use this offline compiler without any network connection , the compiler is workable at anytime and anywhere.

There are three buttons: Undo, Redo, Compile&Run button 

'Undo' button means that reverses the last action you performed

'Redo' means that undoes the last Undo action.

'Compile & Run' button will compile and run your code and pop a window which displays the output in the program display column and the error message of your program


The class file is stored on the application ,and named as Main.java . So you MUST NOT change the class name otherwise an error will occur (e.g The public type #yourClassName# must be defined in its own file )
